metadata.name: Contempt
metadata.description:
This amazing piece illustrates one of the different types of emotions that have an influence on how we live and interact with others.
Contempt represent a state of emotion which feels that a person or a thing is worthless or beneath consideration. Also characterized as scorn, disdain etc
Itâ€™s a 1/1 and expressively created with acrylic paints and charcoal.
